data.weather: No overnight rain Tues/Wed. 4.5mm rain Wed morning. Now should be dry. Possible showers
data.other: Forecasters adamant that we shall get rain this morning but unsure on amount. Likely that rain will put ground back to good to soft. Both tracks raced on once at meeting on 16th October. Great covering of grass, perfect jumping ground. The official opening of the new weighing room, medical room and owners' and trainers' bar (The Cool Roxy Bar) will happen at 12 noon on race day. Please come along. Any questions give me a buzz on 07767 802206. David.

Both tracks raced on once at meeting on 16th October. Great covering of grass, perfect jumping ground. The official opening of the new weighing room, medical room and owners' and trainers' bar (The Cool Roxy Bar) will happen at 12 noon on race day. Please come along. Any questions give me a buzz on 07767 802206. David.
